name: Grenades in the washing machine
description:
Don't put grenades in your washing machine. That's a terrible idea.

Objective:

Destroy the little guys. Get lots of points! The arrow points toward the most valuables!

Controls:
  • Arrow keys to move
  • It shoots grenades automatically on the music's rythmn. They also explode on tempo!
Credits
  • Design and code by narF
  • Music shamefully stolen (sorry!) from Chipzel's Crypt of the Necrodancer remix. Buy her stuff, she's rad!
